entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023
